description: Create user_profiles table to store extended user information beyond auth.users, including company, role, and onboarding status
rollback_sql: DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS on_auth_user_email_verified ON auth.users; DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS on_auth_user_created ON auth.users; DROP FUNCTION IF EXISTS public.sync_user_email_verified(); DROP FUNCTION IF EXISTS public.handle_new_user(); DROP TABLE IF EXISTS user_profiles CASCADE;
